title: SynDojo Drone Inspections and Simulator Training
teaser: SynDOJO is the most realisitic simulated environment controlled system on the market today.
body:
SynDOJO for Energy & Industrial Operations

Train, Simulate, Inspect without risk, delay, or downtime

In high value energy operations, from offshore drill rigs to cross country pipelines, every inspection, every flight, and every minute counts. SynDOJO takes the proven capabilities of defense grade unmanned Systems

Training and Simulation and applies them to the unique challenges of Oil & Gas and Heavy Industry.

With SynDOJO, operators train in a Sensor accurate, AI powered Simulation Environment that mirrors the exact rigs, pipelines, and refineries they work around and inspect in the real world without the risk of crashing drones, halting production, damaging assets, or worse.

There are a lot of Key Advantages to using SynDOJO in your Organization.

Zero Risk Drone Pilot Training

  • Practice complex flight paths in photorealistic 3D replicas of your assets before going on-site.
  • Avoid downtime from damaged drones, no hardware risk, no learning on the job, which can be very expensive and time consuming.
  • Accelerate training pipelines allowing pilots to qualify in days instead of months.

Accurate, Real-World Simulations

  • Sensor Accurate EO/IR & Multispectral feeds for detecting corrosion, leaks, heat anomalies, or equipment wear.
  • Dynamic weather and lighting conditions for all season, all conditions readiness.
  • AI assisted mission scripting allows you to design inspection routes & emergency scenarios in minutes.

Pipeline & Refinery Inspection Readiness

  • Simulate thermal inspections for pipeline thin spots or hot joints.
  • Train teams to fly close proximity inspections without damage to infrastructure.
  • Prepare for complex refinery environments with 3D hazard mapping.

Cost & Time Savings

  • Reduce live flight hours by up to 70% while improving mission quality.
  • Cut training delays caused by hardware repairs or weather cancellations.
  • Virtualize asset access gives you the advantage of training on remote rigs or inaccessible sites without travel.

How It Works

  • Custom digital twin creation replicates your rigs, pipelines, or plants with high-fidelity 3D models, using your CAD, LiDAR, or aerial imagery.
  • Sensor simulation, EO/IR, multispectral, and thermal feeds are simulated with operational accuracy so inspection skills translate directly to real-world work.
  • Scenario designs allow you to create and edit inspection & maintenance scenarios instantly, simulating corrosion hotspots, heat leaks, or obstruction hazards.
  • Seamless transition to field ops, export operations plans directly to your drone control software.

Example Use Cases

  • Drill rig pre-deployment lets you train teams on new rigs before arriving offshore, so no operational time is lost.
  • Pipeline monitoring teaches pilots to recognize pipeline anomalies through thermal and multispectral overlays.
  • Refinery asset inspection and safely allows you to practice close-quarters navigation around complex pipework and heat intensive zones.
  • Emergency response drills simulate leak detection and containment scenarios without putting people or equipment at risk.

Why SynDOJO Works in Energy

  • Defense grade simulation tech built on systems proven by the U.S. Department of Defenseâ€™s Blue UAS program.
  • Sensor & AI Integration combines high-fidelity visuals with data-driven anomaly detection.
  • Scalable & Portable allowing you to train anywhere, anytime, on-site or in training centers.
